long_description: With an insulated neoprene sleeve and an 18 fl. oz. capacity, the FuelBelt Slice Insulated Palm Holder helps you get through those long training runs. Includes an 18 fl. oz. polyethylene bottle that is shaped to fit your hand; bottle is leakproof, dishwasher safe and 100% BPA free. Removable insulated neoprene sleeve helps keep your beverage cool on a hot day; reflective hits increase your visibility at night. Slip the adjustable, padded hand strap over your hand and you're ready to go. Zippered front pocket holds your cell phone, cash, credit card and house key.
short_description: With an insulated neoprene sleeve and an 18 fl. oz. capacity, the FuelBelt Slice Insulated Palm Holder helps you get through those long training runs.
